label: cascading_failure_01_dx_storage_capacity_008
content:

### Events
- Cleared rebalance backlog by completing 9 jobs; measured improved skew index to 1.11 and reduced hot partition concentration.
- Firmware updates applied to two storage controllers; validated no increase in disk error counters post-change.
- One disk failure on stor-b-01; replaced and rebuilt in 6.9 hours with no customer impact.
- Lifted prior ingest caps after compaction pending fell under 80 and disk busy p95 dropped below 89%.

### On Call
- Shift: Tom W.
- Pages: 3
- Tickets: 8
- Status: Stable; recovery from prior compaction pressure continues, with steady utilization and successful maintenance.
